mapper.select: SELECT jp.id, jp.jobId,p.id packId,p.`name`,p.startTime,p.endTime,p.goalName,p.region,j.school FROM jobpack jp, pack p, job j where jp.jobId = #{jobId} and jp.packId = p.id and jp.jobId = j.id
SELECT count(*) count FROM jobpack jp, pack p, job j where jp.jobId = #{jobId} and jp.packId = p.id and jp.jobId = j.id and goalName!=""
mapper.update: update pack set goalName = #{goalName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user where phone = #{phone} and password = #{password}
